txtPlayBackgroundVideoInAllMenus: Play background-video in all menus (not only main-menu)
txtPlayBackgroundVideoSoundIfPresent: Play sound of background-video, if present
txtEnterFullscreenOnContentPlayback: Enter fullscreen mode on content playback
txtEnableContentAutoPlayback: Auto play next content, if available
txtAutoRestrictPlayerMobileGui: Automatically restrict the player-GUI on mobile devices
txtClearLastPlayedContentData: Clear information about the last played content
